articles.title: 'Don't ask me how': Woman 'somersaults' down Changi Airport tube slide
articles.summary:
📰 공항, 창이, 기술 관련 뉴스
📢 'Don't ask me how': Woman 'somersaults' down Changi Airport tube slide
articles.content: The woman was left crying in pain after the accident. A woman got flipped upside down while riding the tube slide at Changi Airport's Terminal 4. The post's caption said: "Don't ask me how, but I somersaulted down the slide. Buy your insurance.". The woman is teary-eyed and visibly in pain after the accident. Her friends are seen tending to her afterwards and rubbing her forehead. Others claimed that the slide is catered for children. "Adult weight makes you slide faster than kids

articles.content: SINGAPORE: Tokenize Xchange, a Singapore-based digital exchange platform, has told its users to complete the cash withdrawals or crypto transfers of their assets by Sep 30, after the platform failed to secure a major payment institution (MPI) licence from the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS), The Edge Singapore reported. articles.title: ‘No career, no friends, no way out: Is the government sector a dead end?’
articles.summary:
📰 싱가포르, 정부 관련 뉴스
📢 ‘No career, no friends, no way out: Is the government sector a dead end?’
articles.content: SINGAPORE: In the corridors of a government bureau, an employee sits gaping vacantly at the computer screen. Around, co-workers chatter over cups of steaming coffee, while others scroll through their phones nonchalantly. In the silence, a digital clamour is posted to Reddit: “Anyone else miserable working in the government sector?” It was a question that […]
